doc.field: Richard E. Booker was married to Elizabeth his wife the 10 th Oct. 1788 his daughter Frances was Born the 22 nd Nov. 1789 Dinereater was Born the 1 st day of October 1792 Elizabeth was born the 9 th day of Nov 1795 John Booker was born the 8 th day February 1797 Edward was born the 8 th day of Feburary 1798 Patsy was born the 24 th of January 1800 Sarah was born the 18 th of April 1802 Richard was born the 17 th day of Sept 1804 George was born the 4th day of July 1807 Mary Ann was born the illeg. Carram Booker was Born the 26 th of July 1811 Elizabeth Booker Departed illeg.

John Booker was born February 8 th , 1797 Nancy Booker wife of John B. was born December 24 th , 1796 illeg. Mary A. Booker was born August 12 th 1825 illeg. Armistead M, Booker was born November 27 th ,1827 and departed this life June 22 th 1838, the 11 th , year of his age Caroline U, Booker was born July 21, 1833 William Booker was born August 10 th 1836 James Booker was born October 10 th 1840 John Booker was born October 10 1840 Jame John Booker Departed this life the 26 of August 1864
booker family records a machine readable transcription
